subject: Tennis
Coaches and Managers
Drug Abuse and Traffic
Methamphetamines
lead_paragraph: Brad Gilbert, who worked with Andre Agassi from 1994 to 2002, said he also had no idea that Agassi used crystal meth.
snippet: Brad Gilbert, who worked with Andre Agassi from 1994 to 2002, said he also had no idea that Agassi used crystal meth.
